Text: Run for the Sun is a 1956 Technicolor thriller adventure film released by United Artists, the third film to officially be based on Richard Connell's classic suspense story, "The Most Dangerous Game", after both RKO's "The Most Dangerous Game" (1932), and their remake, "A Game of Death" (1945).
